description: Taoqi is the director of border defense at the Ministry of Development. Despite her seemingly laid-back demeanor, she consistently proves to be a dependable and supportive individual, always lending her hand to those in need. Taoqi is not only a reliable colleague, but also a trustworthy friend that people can confide in.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Taoqi là giám đốc phòng thủ biên giới của Bộ Phát triển. Mặc dù có thái độ có vẻ thoải mái nhưng cô ấy luôn chứng tỏ mình là một người đáng tin cậy và luôn hỗ trợ, luôn giúp đỡ những người gặp khó khăn. Taoqi không chỉ là một đồng nghiệp đáng tin cậy mà còn là một người bạn đáng tin cậy mà mọi người có thể tâm sự.
descriptionLocalized.id: Taoqi adalah direktur pertahanan perbatasan di Kementerian Pengembangan. Terlepas dari sikapnya yang tampak santai, dia secara konsisten membuktikan dirinya sebagai individu yang dapat diandalkan dan mendukung, selalu mengulurkan tangannya kepada mereka yang membutuhkan. Taoqi bukan hanya kolega yang dapat diandalkan, tetapi juga teman yang dapat dipercaya yang dapat dipercaya orang.
descriptionLocalized.th: เต้าฉีเป็นผู้อำนวยการฝ่ายป้องกันชายแดนที่กระทรวงพัฒนา แม้เธอจะดูเหมือนเป็นคนขี้เล่น แต่เธอก็พิสูจน์ให้เห็นว่าเป็นคนน่าเชื่อถือและให้การสนับสนุนเสมอ เธอพร้อมจะยื่นมือช่วยเหลือคนที่ต้องการความช่วยเหลือ เต้าฉีไม่เพียงแต่เป็นเพื่อนร่วมงานที่ไว้ใจได้ แต่ยังเป็นเพื่อนที่ไว้ใจได้อีกด้วย ที่คนสามารถไว้ใจได้

quote: Phew... All set. Time for a little break.

quoteLocalized.vi: Phù... Đã xong. Đã đến lúc nghỉ ngơi một chút.
quoteLocalized.th: Phew... Selesai. Waktu untuk istirahat sebentar.

resonanceChain.name: Essense of Tranquility
resonanceChain.description: Forte Circuit **Power Shift**'s Shield is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Silent Strength
resonanceChain.description: The Crit. Rate and Crit. DMG of Resonance Liberation **Unmovable** is increased by {0} and {1}, respectively.

resonanceChain.name: Keen-eyed Observer
resonanceChain.description: The duration of Resonance Skill **Rocksteady Shield** is extended to {0}s.

resonanceChain.name: Heavylifting Duty
resonanceChain.description: When Taoqi successfully triggers Heavy Attack **Strategic Parry**, she restores {0} HP and increases her DEF by {1} for {2}s. This can be triggered once every {3}s.

resonanceChain.name: Benevolent Guardian
resonanceChain.description: The damage of Forte Circuit **Power Shift** is increased by {0}. When Forte Circuit **Power Shift** hits a target, restore {1} Resonance Energy.

resonanceChain.name: Defender of Peace
resonanceChain.description: The damage of Taoqi's Basic Attack and Heavy Attack is increased by {0} while the Shield granted by Resonance Skill **Rocksteady Shield** holds.

skills.name: Concealed Edge
skills.description:
**Basic Attack**
Taoqi performs up to 4 continuous attacks, dealing Havoc DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack**
Taoqi consumes Stamina and enters **Rocksteady Defense** state.
 
**Rocksteady Defense**
Taoqi's damage taken is reduced by 35%**;
-When Taoqi is attacked during **Rocksteady Defense**, she will cat **Strategic Parry**;
-**Strategic Parry** is automatically cast after **Rocksteady Defense** lasts for 3**s;
-If Taoqi is attacked when casting Resonance Skill **Rocksteady Shield**, **Strategic Parry** is automatically cast.
 
**Strategic Parry**
Taoqi attacks the target, dealing Havoc DMG**.
 
**Mid-air Attack**
Taoqi consumes Stamina to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Havoc DMG**.
 
**Dodge Counter**
Use **Basic Attack** after a successful **Dodge** to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG**.

skills.name: Fortified Defense
skills.description:
Taoqi deals Havoc DMG** to surrounding targets, generating 3** Rocksteady Shield and restoring HP to Taoqi.
If attacked when casting **Fortified Defense**, **Strategic Parry** will be automatically cast.
 
**Rocksteady Shield**
When the active character is attacked, 1** **Rocksteady Shield** is consumed to reduce the damage taken.

skills.name: Unmovable
skills.description: Launch an attack based on Taoqi's DEF on the target, dealing Havoc DMG**.

skills.name: Steadfast Protection
skills.description: During the duration of the Resonance Skill **Rocksteady Shield**, the Character's DEF is increased by 15%**.

skills.name: Unyielding
skills.description: After **Heavy Attack: Strategic Parry** is successfully triggered, 25** Stamina is recovered.

skills.name: Defense Formation
skills.description: Attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG**.

skills.name: Power Shift
skills.description:
**Timed Counters**
When carrying "Resolving Caliber", use **Basic Attack** after **Heavy Attack: Strategic Parry** or **Intro Skill: Defense Formation** to cast **Timed Counters**, performing up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG**, considered as Basic Attack damage.
**Timed Counters** consume 1** "Resolving Caliber" upon hitting an enemy to grant a shield.
After casting the Intro Skill **Defense Formation**, using **Basic Attack** can directly cast **Timed Counters**.
 
**Resolving Caliber**
Taoqi can hold up to 3** Resolving Caliber.
**Basic Attack 4** will consume all of Taoqi's **Rocksteady Shields** to obtain that many "Resolving Caliber".
While **Rocksteady Shield** exists, when the on-field character is attacked, 1** **Rocksteady Shield** will be consumed, and "Resolving Caliber" is recovered.
After **Rocksteady Shield** ends, all remaining **Rocksteady Shield** will be consumed to grant that many "Resolving Caliber".

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking
